about_the_game:
Explore Breathtaking Alien Scenarios

Welcome to the captivating world of Intergalactic Mystery! In a distant galaxy, get ready to embark on an epic journey filled with extraterrestrial wonders. Follow Duke, a fearless mercenary, and Floc, an enigmatic alien, as they explore stunning and mysterious landscapes that will challenge your imagination.

Thrilling and Challenging Battles

Action is the name of the game! In Intergalactic Mystery, every step is an opportunity to unleash thrilling battles. Face formidable opponents and test your skills in epic confrontations. Master the art of combat while utilizing a variety of weapons and strategies to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies that threaten intergalactic peace.

Uncover the Mysteries of the Universe

Get ready to dive into an intriguing plot that unveils the deepest secrets of the universe. Follow Duke and Floc as they unravel ancient mysteries and challenge dark forces that threaten the existence of all life forms. Each discovery reveals new layers of the narrative, keeping you eager to unravel each cosmic enigma.

Exploration, RPG, and Adventure in One Game

Intergalactic Mystery offers a diverse experience that combines elements of exploration, RPG, and adventure all in one place. Navigate through unknown planets, enhance Floc's abilities through meaningful dialogue choices with NPCs, and immerse yourself in missions full of exciting twists. Each decision shapes the fate of the universe and its characters.

Celebrate the Friendship of Duke and Floc

Amid intergalactic challenges, an unlikely friendship blossoms between Duke and Floc. Delve into the bonds between these two captivating characters as they share exciting moments, learnings, and mutual growth. Their interactions add a human touch to the vastness of outer space, creating a unique emotional connection that will warm your heart.

Get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey through the stars in Intergalactic Mystery. Unravel cosmic puzzles, battle formidable enemies, and explore stunning alien worlds as you and your favorite characters face epic challenges and forge an intergalactic destiny that will be etched in history.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHZ dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting Direcx 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Embark on an epic adventure with Duke and Floc, fighting in alien worlds, unraveling cosmic secrets, and challenging bosses in search of the celestial origins of an enigmatic Alien. RPG, adventure, shooting, and NPC interaction. Get ready for intense action!
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
